# The `RegClassWeight` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Each <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterclass">TargetRegisterClass</a> has a per register weight, and weight limit which must be less than the limits of its pressure sets. <a href="#details">More...</a>

<CodeBlock>struct llvm::RegClassWeight</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Each <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterclass">TargetRegisterClass</a> has a per register weight, and weight limit which must be less than the limits of its pressure sets.
